name: Trick Shot Golf Lite
description:
Trick Shot Golf is a casual but challenging physics based golf game. Test your skills on golf holes ranging from easy to downright crazy!

★ Choose from practice or full round modes

★ Easy to pick up and play, but hard to master

★ Use the trace marker to see where your shot will go, perfect for putting and chip shots

★ Universal app that works on iPhone, iPod, and iPad.

★ Design your own course and submit your levels to earn free games from our catalog!

★ Compete on global leader boards (full version only)

Note this is the lite version, which has 6 holes and leader boards are disabled.

For more games visit www.RockingPocketGames.com
For support, email support@RockingPocketGames.com
